metadata.title: AI FileSense - AI-Powered File Organization for Windows
metadata.description: Finally organize your Desktop, Documents, and Downloads without uploading anything to the cloud. Smart AI classification that respects your privacy.

footer.tagline: AI-powered file organization for Windows. Your files stay on your computer — only filenames are sent to AI for smart classification.

hero.title: Your documents, finally organized.
hero.subtitle: AI FileSense analyzes your files locally—nothing leaves your computer—and organizes them into folders that make sense.

solution.title: How It Works
solution.subtitle: Organized in three simple steps
solution.step1Desc: Point to Documents, Desktop, or Downloads. AI FileSense finds PDFs, Word docs, and text files.
solution.step2Desc: Local AI reads filenames and content to understand what each document is—never uploaded anywhere.
solution.step3Desc: Review the plan, make changes if needed, then apply. Full undo log saved automatically.

features.title: Built for Privacy, Designed for You
features.subtitle: Powerful features that respect your data
features.aiClassificationDesc: Claude Haiku reads your documents and intelligently categorizes them based on actual content, not just filenames.
features.smartFoldersDesc: Numbered folders (01-11) keep everything in logical order: Work, Money, Home, Health, Legal, School, Family, Clients, Projects, Archive, and Review.
features.organizationDepthDesc: Choose light (top folders only), moderate (with subfolders), or detailed (date-based nesting) organization.
features.safeReversibleDesc: Preview every change before it happens. One-click undo for any file or entire sessions. Crash recovery built-in.
features.privacyFirstDesc: Files stay on your computer. Only small text snippets are sent to AI for classification—never full documents.
features.fullyBilingualDesc: Complete English and Spanish (Mexico) support. AI understands documents in both languages.

folders.title: 11 Smart Folders
folders.subtitle: Covering personal and professional documents
folders.workDesc: Resumes, job offers, performance reviews, payslips, employment contracts
folders.moneyDesc: Bank statements, tax returns, investments, receipts, invoices, budgets
folders.homeDesc: Mortgage docs, rent agreements, utility bills, repair records, warranties
folders.healthDesc: Medical records, prescriptions, lab results, insurance cards, vaccination records
folders.legalDesc: Contracts, agreements, licenses, IDs, passports, legal correspondence
folders.schoolDesc: Course materials, certificates, transcripts, diplomas, research papers
folders.familyDesc: Family correspondence, kids' school records, personal letters, family documents
folders.clientsDesc: Client documents, vendor contracts, project invoices (for freelancers & small businesses)
folders.projectsDesc: Project deliverables, milestones, active work documents, collaboration files
folders.archiveDesc: Documents older than 3 years, completed projects, historical records
folders.reviewDesc: Low-confidence items needing manual sorting—AI wasn't sure where these belong

cta.title: Ready to Get Organized?
cta.subtitle: Download AI FileSense and organize your files in 5 minutes. No account needed, 100% private.

hero.title: How AI FileSense Works
hero.subtitle: Smart organization that runs entirely on your computer

scan.title: 1. Scan
scan.description: Point it at your Documents, Desktop, or Downloads. AI FileSense finds PDFs, Word docs, and text files—even in subfolders.

analyze.title: 2. Analyze
analyze.description: Our local AI reads filenames and content (never uploaded anywhere) to understand what each document is: invoices, contracts, medical records, school assignments, and more.

organize.title: 3. Organize
organize.description: Choose your style: Simple (topic-based folders), Timeline (by year and month), or Smart Groups (by client, project, or entity).

review.title: 4. Review & Apply
review.description: See exactly where each file will go. Change any suggestion. Then apply—with a complete undo log saved automatically.

differentiators.title: What Makes AI FileSense Different
differentiators.subtitle: Built from the ground up for privacy and intelligence

contentBased.title: Content-Based Intelligence
contentBased.description: Unlike simple rule-based organizers, AI FileSense actually reads your documents to understand what they are—a bank statement vs. an invoice vs. a tax form.

trulyBilingual.title: Truly Bilingual
trulyBilingual.description: Full English and Spanish (Mexico) support throughout the app and AI classification. Documents in either language are understood and categorized correctly.

humanInLoop.title: Human-in-the-Loop Design
humanInLoop.description: You always preview and approve changes before they happen. Low-confidence items go to Review for your decision. You're always in control.

privacyRespecting.title: Privacy-Respecting Architecture
privacyRespecting.description: Files never leave your computer. Only small text snippets (~500 chars) are sent to AI. Your username is stripped from file paths.

smartFolders.title: Smart Folder Structure
smartFolders.description: 11 numbered folders (01-11) based on real-world document types. Covers work, personal, and business needs in one consistent system.

crashRecovery.title: Crash Recovery & Safety
crashRecovery.description: Every file move is logged with original and new paths. Undo any change, recover from crashes, and always get back to where you started.

personalized.title: Personalized to How You Work
personalized.description: Answer a few questions about your work style (freelancer, student, parent, etc.) and get organization recommendations tailored to you.

fileTypes.title: Supported File Types
fileTypes.subtitle: AI FileSense extracts content from these document formats

roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Where we are and where we're going

phase1.title: Phase 1
phase1.description: Core features: AI classification, 11-folder system, 3-level organization, preview & undo, bilingual support, crash recovery.

phase2.title: Phase 2
phase2.description: Excel/CSV support, image classification, file watcher for auto-organize, custom rules engine, advanced filtering.

phase3.title: Phase 3
phase3.description: macOS and Linux support, cloud sync options, team sharing features, enterprise integrations.

technical.title: System Requirements
technical.subtitle: What you need to run AI FileSense

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more

apiCosts.title: About API Costs
apiCosts.subtitle: You bring your own Anthropic API key
apiCosts.howItWorksDesc: AI FileSense uses Claude AI for smart classification. You provide your own API key, so you only pay for what you use.

faq.title: Pricing FAQ
faq.q1: Why do I need my own API key?
faq.a1: This keeps your costs low and gives you full control. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions beyond the Pro tier.
faq.q2: How do I get an API key?
faq.a2: Sign up at anthropic.com, add billing info, and generate an API key. We have a step-by-step guide in the app.
faq.q3: What if I hit my file limit?
faq.a3: You can still scan and search, but new AI classifications will pause until you upgrade or the month resets.
faq.a4: Yes, within 30 days of purchase if you're not satisfied.
faq.a5: Not yet, but it's on our roadmap. Contact us if you're interested.
faq.a6: We offer discounts for students, educators, and nonprofits. Contact us with proof of eligibility.

hero.subtitle: Organize your files in 5 minutes. 100% local processing.

apiKey.step1Desc: Create a free account or sign in
apiKey.step2Desc: Find it in the left sidebar
apiKey.step5Desc: Your key is encrypted and stored locally
apiKey.note: Your API key never leaves your computer except to authenticate with Anthropic.

hero.title: Organized in 5 Minutes
hero.subtitle: From download to organized files—here's exactly what to expect.

gettingStarted.overview: AI FileSense walks you through 8 simple steps. Most people are organizing files within 5 minutes of downloading.

selectFolders.title: Select Folders & File Types
selectFolders.description: Choose which folders to organize (Documents, Desktop, Downloads) and which file types to include (PDF, Word, PowerPoint, text files).

scanning.title: Scanning
scanning.description: AI FileSense scans your selected folders and extracts text from documents. Files stay on your computer—only small snippets are sent to AI.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Answer a few quick questions about how you work. Freelancer? Student? Parent? This helps AI FileSense recommend the best organization style.

resultsPreview.title: Results Preview
resultsPreview.description: See a summary of how your files will be organized across the 11 folders. Get a bird's-eye view before diving into details.

detailedReview.title: Detailed Review
detailedReview.description: Review each file's proposed destination. Change any suggestion you disagree with. Take your time—nothing moves until you approve.

quickClarifications.title: Quick Clarifications
quickClarifications.description: AI may ask about ambiguous files: 'Is this a personal or business document?' Your answers improve future classifications.

applyingChanges.title: Applying Changes
applyingChanges.description: Click Apply and watch your files move to their new homes. Every move is logged with original and new paths for easy undo.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your files are now organized into numbered folders. Use the Activity Log to undo any change, or undo everything with one click.

folders.title: The 11 Smart Folders
folders.description: AI FileSense organizes your documents into these intelligent categories:

activityLog.title: Activity Log & Undo
activityLog.description: Every file move is tracked. Undo a single file, an entire session, or roll back everything. Even if the app crashes, you can recover your previous organization.

features.fullRollback: Roll back to any previous state

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1Desc: Your Downloads folder is usually the messiest. Start there and see results immediately.
tips.tip2Desc: Always review the plan before applying. You can change any suggestion.
tips.tip3Desc: The Activity Log tracks everything. You can always go back.
tips.tip4Desc: Experiment with Simple, Timeline, and Smart Groups to find what works for you.

needHelp.title: Need More Help?
needHelp.description: Check our FAQ for common questions or contact support if you're stuck.

hero.title: Contact Support
hero.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help.

contact.checkFaqDesc: Most questions are answered in our FAQ. It's the fastest way to get help.
contact.gettingStartedGuideDesc: New to AI FileSense? Our step-by-step guide will help you get set up.
contact.emailDirectlyDesc: Prefer email? Reach us at support@aifilesense.com
contact.responseTimeDesc: We typically respond within 24-48 hours on business days.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AI FileSense.

questions.q1: Is my data safe? Do my files get uploaded anywhere?
questions.a1: Your files never leave your computer. AI FileSense only sends small text snippets (~500 characters) and anonymized filenames to the AI for classification. Full file contents are never transmitted. Your username is stripped from file paths for additional privacy.
questions.q2: What happens if I don't like how files were organized?
questions.a2: Every file move is logged with the original and new location. You can undo any single file move, undo an entire session, or roll back everything to the original state. Even if the app crashes mid-organization, you can fully recover.
questions.q3: Why are some files put in the 'Review' folder?
questions.a3: When the AI isn't confident about where a file belongs (below 70% confidence), it goes to the Review folder. This keeps your organization clean while letting you make the final call on ambiguous documents.
questions.q4: Can I exclude certain files from being organized?
questions.a4: Yes. During the preview phase, you can deselect any files you want to keep in place. You can also exclude entire folders or file types from scanning in the initial setup.
questions.q5: Does AI FileSense work with languages other than English?
questions.a5: Yes! AI FileSense is fully bilingual with complete English and Spanish (Mexico) support. The AI can read and correctly categorize documents written in either language.
questions.a6: AI FileSense extracts content from PDF files (first page), Word documents (.doc, .docx - full text), PowerPoint (.pptx - slide text), and text files (.txt, .md, .log, .csv - first 100 lines). Any file can be classified by filename alone.
questions.q7: Where do my organized files go?
questions.a7: Files are moved into 11 numbered folders (01 Work through 11 Review) within your chosen destination. The numbered prefixes keep folders in logical order in File Explorer.
questions.q8: Can I run AI FileSense again after organizing?
questions.a8: Absolutely. You can run AI FileSense as many times as you want. It's smart enough to recognize already-organized files and will focus on new or changed documents.
questions.q9: What if the AI categorizes a file incorrectly?
questions.a9: You always preview all changes before they happen. Simply change the suggested folder during preview. If you notice an error after organizing, use the Activity Log to move the file wherever you want.
questions.a10: An internet connection is needed for AI classification (communicating with Anthropic's API). However, scanning files, reviewing changes, and undoing moves all work completely offline.

faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us a message and we'll help you out.

hero.title: About AI FileSense
hero.subtitle: Local-first file organization powered by AI

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We built AI FileSense because organizing files shouldn't mean uploading your personal documents to someone else's server. Your medical records, tax documents, and family photos deserve better than cloud storage and vague privacy policies.

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.intro: We don't just talk about privacy—we built it into the architecture:

items.local: 100% local processing: Your files never leave your computer
items.minimal: Minimal data to AI: Only filenames and ~500 character snippets
items.noAccount: No account required: No signup, no email, no tracking
items.noTelemetry: Zero telemetry: We don't collect analytics or usage data
items.yourKey: Your API key: Direct connection to Anthropic—no middleman
items.encrypted: Encrypted storage: API keys stored securely on your device

values.title: What We Believe
values.privacyDesc: Your files stay on your computer. We never see your data—not filenames, not contents, not metadata. We built it this way on purpose.
values.simplicityDesc: Powerful AI shouldn't mean complex software. Download, add your API key, point at a folder, and you're done.
values.transparencyDesc: You choose your API provider. You see exactly what AI suggests before anything moves. You can undo anything.
